description: Result of a single access approval status request.

accessRequirementId.description: The ID of the requested AccessRequirement.

accessApprovalId.description: The ID of the AccessApproval associated with the requested AccessRequirement; or null if not found.

submissionStatus.description: The status of the DataAccessSubmission associated with the requested AccessRequirement, if the requested AccessRequirement is an ACTAccessRequirement, and the user has submitted a DataAccessSubmission; null otherwise.
